modName: Soulgem merchants sells Black Soul Gems
summary: Fairly simple mod that adds Black Soul gems for sale in merchants that sells ordinary soul gems.
descriptionHtml: This mod simply adds empty and filled Black Soul Gems to merchants that usually would sell ordinary soul gems, like spell merchants and miscellaneous merchants. Please notice that the chance of one merchant having a Black Soul Gem in his/her inventory is the same as any other specific kind of soul gem, so it is possible that merchants have no Black Soul Gems in their inventory at a certain point. The price for those items haven\'t been altered.
author: 3ernardo

files.name: Soulgem merchants sells Black Soul Gems
